theme: Universal Health Care: Trailblazing a New Era of Quality Health Care

keyLegislation.name: Universal Health Care (UHC) Law (RA 11223)
keyLegislation.role: PhilHealth as key implementer of National Insurance Program

vision: Bawat Filipino, Miyembro. Bawat Miyembro, Protektado. Kalusugan ng Lahat, Sigurado.
mission: Benepisyong Pangkalusugan, Sapat at Dekalidad para sa Lahat.
coreValues: Integridad, Inobasyon, Agarang Serbisyo, Taus-pusong Paglilingkod, Pagmamalasakit, Angkop na Benepisyo, Panlipunang Pagkakabuklod
challenges: Year was difficult with controversies, bad press, congressional hearings and political backlash

policyThrusts.detail: Continued implementation guaranteeing zero co-payment for economically challenged
policyThrusts.coverage: No fees charged above PhilHealth's package rate

policyThrusts.detail: Strengthened quasi-judicial business processes and SOPs
From equality of opportunity to attaining UHC goals for whole nation
